name: "Sokoban sandbox"
description:
A game for jamcraft 2.

Quick guide:

  • Move around with arrow keys or WASD (or ZQSD).
  • Use Shift to push, Ctrl to interact.
  • Enter chests or crafting tables by just going in them.
  • Push chests or crafting tables by holding Shift.
  • Push everything else with or without Shift.
    • You can push only one stone at a time. Logs are lighter: you can push two at once. Trees are too heavy to push, but you can cut them down.
  • Equip items by holding Ctrl and moving into them.
  • Craft things by arranging the needed resources on a crafting table, then exiting the table, and finally holding Ctrl and moving toward the crafting table.
  • Axes are used by holding Ctrl and pushing a tree. Note that you might lose some logs if the space after the tree is not free.
  • Pickaxes are used by holding Ctrl and then pulling thing by moving away from them.
  • Note that before crafting a pickaxe you can only push things. If you brick the starting crafting table, you might have to restart the game.

Crafting recepies:

  • Stick: two logs side-by-side
  • Crafting table: 4 logs in a square
  • Chest: 4 stones in a square
  • Axe: 3 stones and a stick filling a 2-by-2 square or 3 stones and 2 logs in a shape similar to the axe itself (as in mincecraft).
  • Pickaxe: 3 stones in a row and a stick in the middle of one side, or 3 stones and 2 logs in a shape similar to the pickaxe itself (as in mincecraft).

Note that the web export might be a bit laggy, in which case you can try the downloadable versions.

Source: https://github.com/bojidar-bg/sokoban-sandbox/tree/jamcraft
